Package papplevaa.notepad.util

Class FileUtil

java.lang.Object
papplevaa.notepad.util.FileUtil
public final class FileUtil extends Object
Utility class providing file-related operations for the Notepad application.

  • Method Details

    • loadContent

      public static String loadContent(File filePath)
      Reads the content of a file and returns it as a string.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the file to be read.
      Returns:
      The content of the file as a string, or null if an error occurs during reading.

    • saveContent

      public static void saveContent(String content, File filePath)
      Writes the provided content to a file.
      Parameters:
      content - The content to be written to the file.
      filePath - The path to the file where the content will be saved.

    • serialize

      public static <T extends Serializable> void serialize(File filePath, T object)
      Serializes an object and saves it to a file.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the object.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the file where the serialized object will be saved.
      object - The object to be serialized and saved.

    • deserialize

      public static <T extends Serializable> T deserialize(File filePath, Class<T> tClass)
      Deserializes an object from a file.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the object.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the file containing the serialized object.
      tClass - The class of the object to be deserialized.
      Returns:
      The deserialized object, or null if an error occurs during deserialization.
